title: RectangleCoordinates
description: A set of coordinates describing a cartographic rectangle on the surface of the ellipsoid.

wsen.description: The set of coordinates specified as Cartographic values `[WestLongitude, SouthLatitude, EastLongitude, NorthLatitude]`, with values in radians.

wsenDegrees.description: The set of coordinates specified as Cartographic values `[WestLongitude, SouthLatitude, EastLongitude, NorthLatitude]`, with values in degrees.

reference.description: The set of coordinates specified as a reference to another property.
